name: Todi - Throwing Hands Edition
description:
Lizard person Todi, is stuck in hell, help him escape.

(Warning, game is quite difficult to finish)

Hello, I'm trying to make a pixel art game. 

I want to release demos along the way to get feedback. This game I made to test out some enemies and combat mechanics, would love to hear any and all feedback.

Enjoy

Thanks to Jim, Oscar, Crossy, Abbie, David and Dad for doing random voice lines / sounds.

Special thanks to Khodos, who did the theme music.

Controls:

Left and Right Arrow Keys or Left Thumbstick = Left and Right movement (or WallSlide)

Down Arrow Key or Right Gamepad Button = Crouch

Space Key or Bottom Gamepad Button = Jump

Q Key or Left Gamepad Button = Attack
